SEARCH
Package com.financial.multi_year_analysis

Class MultiYearBudgetRevenue

java.lang.Object
com.financial.multi_year_analysis.MultiYearBudgetEntry
com.financial.multi_year_analysis.MultiYearBudgetRevenue
public class MultiYearBudgetRevenue extends MultiYearBudgetEntry
Represents a revenue entry in a multi-year budget analysis system. This class extends MultiYearBudgetEntry and maintains a static collection of all historical budget revenues for analysis and reporting purposes.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Financial Analysis System

  • Field Details

    • multiYearBudgetRevenues

      protected static List<MultiYearBudgetRevenue> multiYearBudgetRevenues

  • Constructor Details

    • MultiYearBudgetRevenue

      public MultiYearBudgetRevenue(String code, String description, String category, long amount, int year)
      Constructs a new MultiYearBudgetRevenue and automatically adds it to the historical revenues collection for tracking purposes.
      Parameters:
      code - the unique identifier code for this revenue entry
      description - a textual description of the revenue source
      category - the category this revenue belongs to
      amount - the revenue amount (in minor currency units, e.g., cents)
      year - the fiscal year this revenue applies to

  • Method Details

    • getMultiYearBudgetRevenues

      public static List<MultiYearBudgetRevenue> getMultiYearBudgetRevenues()
      Returns the complete list of all historical budget revenues.
      Returns:
      a list containing all revenue entries created

    • getMultiYearBudgetRevenuesOfSpecificYear

      public static List<MultiYearBudgetRevenue> getMultiYearBudgetRevenuesOfSpecificYear(int year)
      Retrieves all revenue entries for a specific fiscal year.
      Parameters:
      year - the fiscal year to filter by
      Returns:
      a list of revenue entries matching the specified year

    • getMultiYearBudgetRevenuesOfSpecificCode

      public static List<MultiYearBudgetRevenue> getMultiYearBudgetRevenuesOfSpecificCode(String code)
      Retrieves all revenue entries with a specific code across all years. This is useful for tracking a particular revenue source over time.
      Parameters:
      code - the revenue code to filter by
      Returns:
      a list of revenue entries matching the specified code

    • getSumOfSpecificYear

      public static long getSumOfSpecificYear(int year)
      Calculates the total revenue amount for a specific fiscal year by summing all revenue entries for that year.
      Parameters:
      year - the fiscal year to calculate the total for
      Returns:
      the total revenue amount for the specified year

    • getSumOfAllYears

      public static Map<Integer,Long> getSumOfAllYears()
      Calculates the total revenue for each year present in the historical data. Returns a map where keys are years and values are the total revenue amounts. Years are sorted in ascending order.
      Returns:
      a map of year to total revenue amount for all years with data

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a formatted string representation of this revenue entry.
      Overrides:
      toString in class MultiYearBudgetEntry
      Returns:
      a string containing all revenue entry details
